flawed_nl_solution:
Maria wants to pay 3 * 20 = $<<3*20=60>>60 for the canvas.
Maria needs 5 liters of paint, so the cost of it would be 8 * 5 = $<<8*5=40>>40.
So in total Maria will earn 200 - 40 - 60 - 20 = $<<200-40-60-20=60>>60 if she will be able to sell the painting at the mentioned price.
#### 60

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80, not 60. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
